channel.title: I need Help on how to make a server
channel.description:
hey my name is will and i am tryin to make a server.
would every tell me how to make one and what programs i need
could some one please make me a tut on makin a server and hosting and all stuff like that please. ;D
that would help alot thanks from will

item.title: I need Help on how to make a server
item.dc:creator: @Pilldom Pilldom
item.description:
@Pilldom wrote:

Just go to the tutorial sectiona and there is a sticky there that tells you how.

Read full topic
item.source: I need Help on how to make a server
